settings.heading: Saalt Bliss Guarantee
settings.content: If you're not happy with your Saalt product, we'll send you a replacement you'll love or your money back up to a full year from purchase. Why? We know that learning to use reusable options can take some time, but we promise to be with you every step of the way. From video tutorials to live tips and personalized help from our dedicated Saalt Coaches, weâ€™re here to help and cheer you to Saalt bliss. Your Saalt(isfaction) guaranteed.

settings.heading: Shipping
settings.content:
Free shipping for orders domestic orders over $39 via USPS. Orders under $39 will ship for a flat rate of $7. International shipping fees vary.

Please allow 1-3 business days for your order to be processed and shipped. Please allow an additional 3-10 business days for domestic orders to arrive. For international orders, please allow up to 25 business days for orders to arrive.

settings.icon_text: Gentle on your vulva and external intimate areas
Safe and effective for cleaning menstrual cups and discs

settings.text_content: Lab-Tested Flushability: Saalt Intimate Cleansing Wipes meet INDA GD4 guidelines, which means they're rigorously tested to be safely flushed one at a time in well-maintained systems. (Your plumber will thank you.)

Use Saalt Intimate Cleansing Wipes to stay clean, even on the go. No unnecessary fragrances or chemicals, just pure, simple ingredients that keep you feeling fresh.

During Your Period
Designed to easily clean your menstrual cup or disc in the stall or on the go.

Anywhere, Anytime
Public restrooms, backpacking, or wherver life takes you.

Made for Your Vulva Too
Feeling cheeky? Yep, it's okay to use these on your booty, too. Safe for all external intimate areas.
As a certified B Corp, we commit 2% of our revenue to donate period care to regions with the most need, and help fund initiatives in menstrual health, education, and sustainability.

If you're not happy with your Saalt product, we'll send you a replacement you'll love or your money back up to a full year from purchase. Why? We know that learning to use reusables can take time, but we're here to help and cheer you to Saalt bliss.
Your Saalt(isfaction) guaranteed.
